introduction: Good morning/afternoon/evening. I am of O'Brien-Sherwood Research Company. We are doing a survey on smoking.

questions.question: Do you smoke cigarettes, that is, at least a pack a week?
questions.note: ASK ONLY IF NECESSARY: ARE YOU AT LEAST 18 YEARS OF AGE? IF RESPONDENT IS NOT AT LEAST 18 YEARS OLD, DISCONTINUE INTERVIEW.

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes, that is, the brand you smoke most often?
questions.probe: BRAND: TYPE SIZE Filter Regular Non-Filter Menthol King 100's

questions.question: Do you smoke any other brand of cigarettes?
What new brand or brands do you remember seeing advertised?
questions.probe: DO NOT SUGGEST - RECORD IN ORDER EXACTLY AS RESPONDENT STATES THEM.
questions.note: IF 'MARLBORO LIGHTS' EXACTLY THAT NAME MENTIONED IN Q.4, SKIP TO Q.7. OTHERWISE ASK Q.5.

questions.question: Have you ever heard of a cigarette called Marlboro Lights?
Do you remember seeing any advertising for Marlboro Lights?
Do you remember what the advertising said about Marlboro Lights?
sub_questions: What were they trying to tell you about the brand?
What, specifically, was said in the advertising?
What was shown in the advertising?
What ideas were they trying to get across?
Who do you think Marlboro Lights would appeal to?
What kind of people? What kind of smokers?
